comment.author: 18753752@N00
comment._content: Bulgarian minister of War. Couldn't find his full name, but here's a blurb about him going to Russia in 1915. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9B0CE2DD153BE233A...

comment.author: 30085166@N00
comment._content: It's Mikhail Savoff. The Internet has goatloads of references to this guy, and though several pages give his first initial as "M" I was unable to track down his first name until I found him listed as being Bulgaria's Minister of War in 1903 under the name "Colonel Mikhail Savoff" in the Google Books preview of a 1973 book titled "Bidwell's Guide to Government Ministers" (Volume 1), compiled and edited by Robin Bidwell. After that I was able to find confirmation at several web sites, by searching Google with "Mikhail Savoff"
